content: carry all of your essential items in one place with this gorgeous color block crochet tote this pattern works up quickly and is sure to be a requested item from friends it has been with me *this crochet tote bad pattern was updated on 9/18/2023 the end result is the same but some things have been changed as we grow in our skills we learn new and better ways to do things and i have redesigned the summer tote because of this the end result looks the same but is better - i promise this pattern is written in us terms skill level confident advanced beginner crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to read a crochet pattern - there is a video tutorial for this crochet tote bag pattern and the video has the short hand instructions on the side it will still be helpful to know how to read a crochet pattern as the video is not intended to replace the written pattern work the basic stitches - chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet know how to double_crochet 2 together to make a cluster or be willing to learn understand how to work in the round how to close rounds and how to turn after closing a round you should have some basic understanding of creating chains without cutting the yarn from your project
